sentence: Although DSO increased to 71 days due to higher seasonal billing, an increase of 5 days versus the last quarter, it is still a reduction of 2 days versus Q3 of prior year.

sentence: Keith Bachman I want to pick up on the same line of questioning, if you could just talk about the puts and takes as you see margins over the course of the next three, four, five quarters, really calendar year 2022 and I wanted to see if you could address what you think the impact would be for a few things.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: For instance, one of the headwinds this quarter was utilization, how should we be thinking about utilization transform during calendar year 2022?
label: NEUTRAL

sentence: Number two you said attrition was flat sequentially, how do you think about attrition trends over the course of calendar year 2022?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Do you think that they can move lower or is the market such that demand is so strong that attrition will probably remain elevated?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Number three would be you just brought up travel and any other issues that we should we be thinking about that may impact calendar year 2022 margins, and any other issues you want to bring up and that is it from me?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Thank you.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Nilanjan Roy I think that we do not give up the margin guidance for the next year.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Now having said that looking at the headwinds, which we actually say pretty much every year are the compensation hikes, you have clients coming back for discounts on renewals, and some of that you offset with the cost optimization program which we run, and I mentioned that a bit earlier in terms of whether it is a pyramid, whether it is subcon, whether it is automation, new levers which we are looking at is pricing.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: So, that is something which we are continuously working on and remain quite confident.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: Travel is one thing which is quite unknown at this moment in terms of when does it come back, even if it comes back does it come back to pre COVID levels or in a slightly lower levels so we will have to watch out for that really.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: In terms of attrition, I think it is a larger industry issue.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: It is not peculiar to us and fundamentally the volume increase for this industry has to come from freshers.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Otherwise, it's a zero-sum game – somebody else's attrition is my lateral and my attrition is somebody else's lateral.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: So as long as the fresher intake starts increasing because first they have to come into training, then they go into production after 3 or 4 months and that is something which will help with the attrition in the medium term; and like I said we have seen attrition flattening sequentially on a quarterly annualized basis and looking ahead we are seeing some positive signs, but it is too early to say whether it will dramatically come down.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: But like I said, as freshers feed into the system we should see the overall environment in terms of attrition in the market improving.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: Keith Bachman But any comments specifically on utilization?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: You think it will help, I heard it is neutral just broadly, and as part of that the offshore percent of labor increase YoY, is that also a trend that you think continues given the dynamics in front of you?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: And I will see the floor thereafter.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Nilanjan Roy In terms of utilization, this is higher than what we would normally like to be.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: We would rather operate at 85% to 86%, but having said that even if we bring this down in the future it is largely at offshore locations because 75% of our effort is sitting there.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Therefore, utilization does not directly link to the margins because of the way the offshore costs operate, so that is one factor.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: The second question, in the long run - if you see, COVID, while it had a huge impact on demand, the entire ability for the supply side to deliver in a remote environment really will shine up, and that has opened up the eyes of many of our clients that every work does not have to be done onsite.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: It can be done in a near shore location, it can be done offshore and I think the beauty of that is secularly we believe this will help the industry in a much more larger offshoring at an overall level and of course part of that benefit will be shifting more work to offshore locations.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: So, I think this is a good sign.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: I think there can be short term impacts like we saw this quarter, 10 to 20 basis points here and there, but the secular trend - we think we will continue to see that the large global markets will open a lot more offshoring opportunities.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: Diviya Nagarajan Thanks for taking my question and congratulations on a very impressive quarter to the team.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: My question is on pricing, Salil we have seen now several quarters of strong demand and it looks like we are looking at another year, looking at the run rate that we are exiting the calendar with a pretty strong demand as well and you just discussed supply in the last few comments that you made.

sentence: I think on pricing first we have seen some level of stability in what we saw in the specific deals that we closed in Q3 versus Q2.

sentence: On the longer term, Nilanjan has shared in the past we have put in place a very focused effort on communicating the value that we are helping create with our clients through the digital programs.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: We are also seeing as we have shared wage increases, we have done three in the last 12 months and broadly we are seeing large enterprises for the first time in a very long time are seeing inflation in their daily environment and so are more open to having these discussions.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: With these factors in mind, we really see some more value that we can bring in through communicating and demonstrating our digital impact that we are creating through those programs.

sentence: Salil, I have a very simple question, you see now you know, our core which is 41% to 42% of the business is stabilizing on a YoY basis, it is probably little growth is there, but digital continues to be at 40% plus growth, so if this trend continues next year, may be our core may become 32% to 33% of the overall pie, so what is your sense from a long term perspective, where do you see this core stabilizing or do you think it will be unfair to see them separately and in the next two to three years you think everything will converge together.

sentence: The key for the core, instead of looking at the percentage of the business, the key for us is really the core is now stable with a very small growth, so we did not see the decline that we had for some quarters and this makes it extremely strong for us.

sentence: We have probably the best capability in automation and modernization across the industry and with this while everyone else’s core is still shrinking, ours will be stable or possibly even have a small uptick and that means we will be the most competitive in this area.

label: POSITIVE

sentence: Salil Parekh Thanks for your question.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: First, the guidance increase, as I am sure you are seeing this for the year ending March of this year.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: We are not yet commenting in terms of quantitative guidance for next year.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: What is clear nonetheless is the demand environment remains strong and our portfolio of services and capabilities, especially on cloud and digital are resonating well with clients so we see a good pipeline for that.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: Our large deals in this quarter also very strong.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: We continue to see a good large deal pipeline.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: We have seen a steady expansion of our clients over $50, $100, $200 mn and so on.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: We have seen that expansion within clients is working very well and also our new client wins and new accounts are working well.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: So overall we have the various elements of continuing this demand environment strongly but we do not have a specific guidance yet for year starting in April 1, 2022.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Sandeep Shah Fair enough and just last two bookkeeping questions.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: The way I look at is Daimler deal has two legs to ramp up one being the rebadging and employee related ramp up and second being the pass-through data center related ramp up.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Is it fair to say that most of these two legs ramp up is largely behind or may continue in Q4 as well as 1Q of next financial year and second in terms of FY2022 wage hike, is it largely over or something is due in the fourth quarter as well?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Salil Parekh On the Daimler, we do not have any more specifics.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: I can understand what you are looking for, but we have not gone into that specifics now with Q3 and Q4.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: The overall guidance for increase of the revenue covers all of that including Daimler and many other clients and especially with Q4 and the seasonality of that quarter.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: In terms of salary and compensation increases, we have done three of them for this year.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: There is nothing specific that is planned for Q4.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: We will start to look at what we will do in the next financial year but nothing specific is being planned in Q4.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Sandeep Shah Thanks, and all the best Sir.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Manik Taneja Thank you for the opportunity.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: Just wanted to understand we have seen a significant increase in offshore mix of revenues over the last 18 months and this quarter saw a slight aberration.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: What caused that and how do you see this going forward?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Thank you.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Salil Parekh The mix has changed over the last 18 months with a lot of the remote working that was put in place and work from home allowing the work to be delivered from a different location with tremendous yields and efficiency.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: What we saw in the last quarter was, some things have opened up in terms of travel and we are also being extremely optimal in what we have done in the previous quarters and this is something that has given us more ability to drive connects with clients and growth.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: We see in the medium-term, tremendous opportunity for an efficient mix because clients have also seen that once the work is done remotely or work from home that more opportunity exists, there are work to be done from a location further away.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: So, in general as a medium-term trend we see that as a positive trend, we will have of course each quarter some movements up and down but as a longer- term trend we see that as a positive trend.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Manik Taneja Thank you Salil.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: I had one more additional question.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Just wanted to get your thoughts around what we are seeing from a revenue productivity metrics standpoint, for revenue per person standpoint and while there is significant amount of offshore shift over the last 18 months, we have seen utilization go up.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: So, what is causing the increase in revenue productivity despite a significant offshore shift that we have seen over the last 18 months.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: If you could talk about some of the factors that are driving it?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Thank you.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Salil Parekh On the revenue productivity there are a number of things that are going on.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: We see some of the mix of our work which is also changing more to digital and there we see much more revenue productivity coming in.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: As you pointed out utilization has also gone up.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: We will also see some of our work, for example on the consulting side, data and analytics side growing well and that is giving us some level of boost.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: There is also some impact which we have not quantified externally on leveraging some amount of automation and platforms that gives us this benefit.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: So, there are several factors at work despite the onshore offshore mix changes.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Manik Taneja Sure, thank you and all the best for future.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: Rahul Jain Thanks for the opportunity and congratulations.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: I have a question regarding the core revenue which has seen stabilization this year, I think you have addressed this point partly but wanted to understand what could be the prospect for this side of the revenue in the coming years especially when we talk about so much shift to digitalization?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Salil Parekh There we have no individual guidance for digital or for the core in that sense, even for Q4 or for the next financial year.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: But structurally what is clear is we have been successful in driving automation and modernization while we make sure that we are probably the most competitive large player in the market, working with large clients.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: This certainly enhances the strong confidence and if we can continue to execute on that, it will have its own benefits in the medium term.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: Rahul Jain One more thing on the taxation part our tax rate you know steadily has been upwards of 27% on an average, this looks little higher given the country where most of our earnings belongs to so any flavor you can share in terms of what should be the ideal tax rate on a sustainable basis and in near-term?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Nilanjan Roy Our tax rate has always hovered around this 27%, 28% range and I do not think you will see much movement going against the range.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Because in any case, as you know, this is India rate plus other countries.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: 25% is India-only rate.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: So I think, in the long run, you will be around this range itself.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Rahul Jain So which regions tax rate are much higher than the 25% rate also for taking this number higher than the average?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Nilanjan Roy Yes, so see we cannot give that individually, but there are some jurisdictions and also in some jurisdiction where those taxes cannot be set off here as well, so it is a combination of both.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Rahul Jain Okay so if we are not able to set that off those results in double taxation.
label: NEUTRAL

sentence: That is also a reason okay got it thank you so much.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: James Friedman Let me echo the congratulations for this fiscal year.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: I just had one simple question across for Nilanjan, can you remind us what the capital allocation strategy is.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: I remember you had put it out during the analyst day in November 2020 but where is share repurchase in the prioritization.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Thank you.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Nilanjan Roy What we had announced in FY20 basically, was that we have taken capital allocation to 85%, prior to this it was 70% and we said that we will take that over the period of 5 years through a combination of progressive growth-oriented dividend policy plus either share buyback or one off special dividends.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: And in the first two years, as we have announced, we have actually paid back 82% through higher increased normal dividends and also through share buyback which we announced last year.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: We have already paid back 82% and we remain quite committed to overall 85% over 5 years.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: James Friedman Got it.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Thank you so much.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Vimal Gohil Thank you for the opportunity and congratulations on a great quarter.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: My question is on your employee cost which partially has been addressed but how should we think about the core employee cost growth which comes under the cost of revenue which has seen around 4% CQGR increase over Q1 of FY2021 versus the 6% revenue growth and this has been in light of a very sharp increase in attrition and of course further supply challenges and etc.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: So, if you can just highlight, are our wage hikes in line with the industry or have they been much higher than the industry?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: How should we think about this historically and if you could give some kind of an outlook over there as well?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Thanks.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Nilanjan Roy Yes, so you have to see both employee cost and subcon together as the cost of people as a combination, you cannot see one in isolation that is number one.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Number two, just from an overall cost perspective, we of course are very focused on the attrition and being competitive in the markets as well as being employer of choice for many of our employee.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Going ahead when we look at intervention on the compensation side like Salil said, we did across, in January, we did across the board, in July we have done across the board, in Q3 as well we have done very segmented and for targeted talent and we will continue doing that into Q4 etc., looking at high points of attrition and doing it much more tactically to see where we are seeing demand being high in the markets for those skills and target those employees really.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: So, I think it is very nuanced like I said and we will continue doing that.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Vimal Gohil Sir, so basically if we were to look at your guidance, it implies 0% to 2% sort of a revenue growth in Q4.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: Considering the fact that there were some furloughs in Q3, your revenue growth could be higher than what you have reported in Q3.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: So, is your guidance conservative at this point in time how should we think about that?
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Salil Parekh In terms of the guidance, it was very strong.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: It is 19.5% to 20%.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: There is no further color in saying whether it is conservative, aggressive, or stable.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: We see a very good demand outlook; we see good large deals and good portfolio and the guidance is a very big move up from where we were in the last quarter.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: Vimal Gohil – Union AMC Fair enough Sir.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Thank you so much and all the very best.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: Sandeep Mahindroo Thanks Salil for closing comments and thanks again for joining us on this call.
label: NEGATIVE

sentence: Look forward to talking to you again during the year.
label: POSITIVE

sentence: Thank you.
label: POSITIVE
